exterior.name: The Algorithmic Home
exterior.subtitle: Your Personal Performance Sanctuary
exterior.description: A solarpunk mansion where every room is designed to optimize human performance. Click on any room to explore.

content.title: The System
content.subtitle: Algorithmic Feedback Loop
content.body: The home's AI continuously monitors biometric data (sleep, HRV, productivity) and adjusts environmental factors (lighting, temperature, sound) to optimize your performance without requiring willpower.
content.science: Based on principles from behavioral design, circadian biology, and environmental psychology.

bedroom.name: The AEON Sanctuary
bedroom.subtitle: Sleep Optimization Suite
bedroom.description: Your bedroom becomes a sleep laboratory. Thermal regulation, circadian lighting, and biometric tracking work in harmony.

content.title: Thermal Grid Mattress
content.subtitle: 8Sleep-Style Bi-Phasic Cooling
content.body: The mattress actively regulates temperature throughout the night. Cools to 65°F for deep sleep initiation, then gradually warms before wake time for a natural cortisol rise.
content.science: Body temperature drops 2-3°F during deep sleep. External cooling accelerates this process, increasing deep sleep duration by up to 20%.

content.title: Real-Time HRV Display
content.subtitle: Heart Rate Variability Tracking
content.body: A bedside display shows your current HRV, sleep score, and recovery status. The system uses this data to adjust next-day recommendations.
content.science: HRV is the gold standard for measuring parasympathetic recovery. Higher HRV correlates with better cognitive performance and lower all-cause mortality.

content.title: Red Light Therapy Panels
content.subtitle: Infrared Recovery System
content.body: Integrated panels in the bathroom area provide red and near-infrared light therapy for skin health, mitochondrial function, and circadian support.
content.science: Red light (630-660nm) and near-infrared (810-850nm) wavelengths penetrate tissue to stimulate ATP production in mitochondria, accelerating cellular repair.

content.title: Automated Blackout System
content.subtitle: Complete Light Elimination
content.body: Motorized blackout blinds and light-blocking curtains create complete darkness for optimal melatonin production. The system gradually introduces light in the morning.
content.science: Even small amounts of light (phone LED, digital clock) can suppress melatonin by up to 50%. True darkness is essential for deep, restorative sleep.

office.name: The Sovereign Studio
office.subtitle: Deep Work Environment
office.description: Your office anticipates your cognitive needs. Environmental distractions vanish. Deep work becomes your default state.

content.title: 90-Minute Focus Blocks
content.subtitle: Ultradian Rhythm Optimization
content.body: A large display shows your current focus block, remaining time, and session count. The room's environment shifts to support focus: phone blockers activate, lighting shifts to electric blue.
content.science: Humans operate in 90-minute ultradian cycles. Matching work sessions to these natural rhythms maximizes cognitive output and reduces mental fatigue.

content.title: Obsidian Knowledge Graph
content.subtitle: Second Brain Visualization
content.body: A transparent OLED display shows your personal knowledge graph - all notes, ideas, and connections from your second brain system.
content.science: Externalizing cognitive load to a trusted system frees working memory for creative thinking. Visual graphs help identify non-obvious connections.

content.title: Feynman Technique Boards
content.subtitle: Active Recall Learning
content.body: Analog whiteboards for teaching concepts to yourself. The act of explaining forces deep understanding and reveals gaps in knowledge.
content.science: Active recall strengthens memory 3-5x more effectively than passive review. The Feynman Technique forces elaboration, the key to long-term retention.

content.title: Standing Desk Default
content.subtitle: Movement-First Workspace
content.body: The desk defaults to standing height. You consciously choose to sit, rather than defaulting to sedentary work. Anti-fatigue mats and balance boards add micro-movement.
content.science: Standing burns 50+ more calories per hour than sitting. More importantly, it increases alertness, blood flow to the brain, and reduces afternoon energy dips.

content.title: Electric Blue Spectrum
content.subtitle: Cognitive Enhancement Lighting
content.body: During focus blocks, the room shifts to a cool blue spectrum (6500K) that promotes alertness and cognitive performance. At break time, it shifts to warmer tones.
content.science: Blue light (460-480nm) suppresses melatonin and activates intrinsically photosensitive retinal ganglion cells, increasing alertness. Strategic use during work hours enhances focus.

kitchen.name: The Nutrition Lab
kitchen.subtitle: Blue Zones x Blueprint Protocol
kitchen.description: A vertical aeroponic farm grows your food. A visual food pyramid triggers appetite for the right nutrients. Frictionless healthy eating.

content.title: High-Pressure Aeroponics Farm
content.subtitle: Zone A & Zone B Growing System
content.body: Zone A grows daily essentials: microgreens, leafy greens, and herbs. Zone B handles 'hacks': sprouted lentils, fermented foods, and specialty items like mushrooms.
content.science: Aeroponics uses 95% less water than soil farming and produces 3x faster growth. Harvesting at peak freshness maximizes nutrient density.

content.title: Visual Food Pyramid
content.subtitle: Maximalist Bio-Architecture
content.body: Healthy foods are displayed like art. The visual presentation triggers appetite for nutrient-dense options before you even feel hungry.
content.science: Food choices are 80% driven by environment, not willpower. Making healthy options visible and beautiful rewires default eating behavior.

content.title: Organized Supplement Stack
content.subtitle: Protocol-Based Supplementation
content.body: Morning and evening supplement protocols are pre-organized. Dispenser tracks doses and adjusts recommendations based on blood test results.
content.science: Consistent supplementation requires system design. Removing friction (measuring, remembering) increases adherence from ~30% to >90%.

living-room.name: The Connection Hub
living-room.subtitle: Digital Detox Zone
living-room.description: Spaces designed for human connection. Golden hour lighting, conversation pits, and phone-free zones bring people together.

content.title: Vulnerability Architecture
content.subtitle: Designed for Deep Connection
content.body: The sunken seating arrangement creates physical intimacy and removes hierarchical positioning. Circular layout ensures everyone can make eye contact.
content.science: Physical environment shapes social dynamics. Lower seating creates psychological safety. Circular arrangements promote equal participation in conversation.

content.title: Warm Orange Spectrum
content.subtitle: Oxytocin-Promoting Environment
content.body: Evening lighting mimics golden hour (2700K-3000K). The warm spectrum promotes relaxation, reduces cortisol, and creates an environment conducive to bonding.
content.science: Warm light signals the brain to transition from alertness to relaxation. Combined with social interaction, it enhances oxytocin release.

content.title: Phone-Free Space
content.subtitle: Blue Zones Social Principle
content.body: A Faraday-style phone locker at the room entrance. When phones go in, the 'Digital Detox Active' indicator lights up. Presence becomes the norm.
content.science: Blue Zones research shows strong social connections are a top predictor of longevity. Phone presence—even when not used—reduces conversation quality by 30%.
